page.title: 02MILE OAK FARM
page.content: {Mile Oak Farm}building is situated in {Square 243081.}The farm extends 2km northwards and also into the next square westwards .The farm is owned by Mr.Cross and family.They grow 75 acres of grass,400 of wheat and some barley. These cereals are used mainly for animal food but some is sold. They have no sheep but, about 320 cattle each worth about Â£400;{Herefords}which are used for meat;{Friesians}for milk. Each cow produces 6000 litres a year and 60000 litres during her lifetime. Mr.Cross sells his animals at Haywards Heath Market,when they are too old to produce any more milk.He buys seed & fertiliser from the Market. The Milk Marketing Board buys his milk and sells it to Southwick Hill Farm Dairy. The farm is highly mechanised and uses vehicles such as tractors,combine harvesters,rollers and muck spreaders.
